meta.content: Westwood CSD - School Closure COVID-19 - Spring 2020

meta.title: Westwood CSD - School Closure COVID-19 - Spring 2020

div.em: Current conditions as of 22 Apr 06:52 am CDT

div.div: Mostly sunny, with a high near 80. Southwest wind 9 to 17 mph becoming northwest in the afternoon. Winds could gust as high as 25 mph.
Mostly clear, with a low around 43. North wind 6 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.
A 20 percent chance of showers after 1pm. Increasing clouds, with a high near 74. North wind 5 to 7 mph becoming calm in the afternoon.
